meanings.sent1: The soup was so flavorful that I couldn't stop eating it.
meanings.sent2: The chef added herbs and spices to make the dish more flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The flavorful ice cream was a hit at the party, disappearing quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling was as flavorful as a well-seasoned dish, captivating everyone.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the flavorful coffee filled the room, enticing everyone to have a cup.

meanings.definition: Having a strong or pleasant taste
meanings.sent1: The curry was flavorful, with a perfect balance of spices.
meanings.sent2: The ripe mango was sweet and flavorful, bursting with juice.
meanings.sent3: The flavorful salsa danced on my taste buds, making me crave more.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as flavorful as a gourmet meal, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The flavorful barbecue sauce coated the ribs, making them irresistible.

meanings.sent1: The stew was flavorful, with layers of savory goodness.
meanings.sent2: The wine was flavorful, with hints of berries and oak.
meanings.sent3: The flavorful chocolate melted in her mouth, bringing a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: His music was as flavorful as a symphony, resonating with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The flavorful curry filled the kitchen with enticing aromas, making everyone hungry.
